data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @yasserogier @cobuspienaar
I have added the following companies:

Franco Upliftment Agencies
Reyn Varkevisser Upliftment
Jossie Wiggill Upliftment

Please can branches called Main be created for these companies.

Then when the branches are created, please move Francios Joubert to Franco Upliftment Agencies, Reyn Varkevisser to Reyn Verkevisser Upliftment and Jossie Wiggill to Jossie Wiggill Upliftment as the admin users in the branch.

Once completed, I will then be able to create the sub users in the respective companies.

Thanks.
